id.description: Unique identifier of the promoted link

text.description: Text content of the promoted link

creationTime.description: Timestamp indicating the creation time of the promoted link

lastModified.description: Timestamp indicating the last modification time of the promoted link

siteName.description: Name of the site where the promoted link is displayed

sectionName.description: Name of the section where the promoted link is displayed

enabled.description: Flag indicating if the promoted link is enabled

campaignId.description: The ID of the campaign associated with the promoted link

archived.description: Flag indicating if the promoted link is archived

documentLanguage.description: Language of the document associated with the promoted link

onAirStatus.description: The on-air status indicating if the promoted link is active

onAir.description: Flag indicating if the promoted link is on air

reason.description: Reason for the on air status of the promoted link

baseUrl.description: Base URL of the promoted link

documentId.description: The document ID associated with the promoted link

metaData.description: Additional metadata associated with the promoted link

approvalStatus.description: The approval status of the promoted link

status.description: The approval status of the promoted link

isEditable.description: Flag indicating if the approval status is editable

description.description: Description of the promoted link content

callToAction.description: The call-to-action content for the promoted link

type.description: Type of the call to action for the promoted link

value.description: Value of the call to action for the promoted link

imageType.description: Type of image used in the promoted link

language.description: Language of the promoted link content
